message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $8000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8200. This is a fair compromise, considering its value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as high as $9100, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $8800. This is the best I can do, considering its value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8400. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm still not willing to go as low as $8400, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $8600. This is the best I can do, considering its value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm still not willing to go as low as $8200, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $8500. This is the best I can do, considering its value to me. What do you think?
I appreciate all your concessions, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
